content.prompt: A certain monthly magazine has both print and online subscribers. Print subscribers are people who pay to have the magazine physically delivered to them each month. Online subscribers are people who pay to have access to the electronic version of the magazine. The editors of the magazine want to study how online subscribers feel about the design of the electronic version, and they will gather data from a sample. Which of the following is a sample of the population of interest?

choices.label: 50 people who buy a copy of the magazine at a newsstand
50 people who find an article in the magazine while searching online

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Describe an appropriate method for gathering and representing data.
